category.name: wcf.acp.cronjob
category.item: The cron job has been added successfully.
Please enter here the path to the PHP file in which the associated cron job class is contained. This path must be relative to the installation folder of the WCF.
This cron job cannot be deleted.
The cron job has been deleted successfully.
Are you sure that you want to remove this cron job?
Here you may enter a short description for the cron job (preferably in English).
This cron job cannot be edited.
The cron job has been modified successfully.
The path you have entered is invalid.
Please enter a valid entry here.
The timings you have set are invalid.
When enabled, the respective task (cronjob) will be repeatedly executed at all possible dates between the previous specified execution date and the next.
The job has been executed successfully.

Configuring cronjobs (automatized scheduled tasks) requires distinct knowledge of the crontab syntax on Unix based systems. More information about this topic can be obtained on the following Webpage: Newbie: Intro to cron.
There is a total of {#$items} cronjob{if $items != 1}s{/if}
Are you sure that you want to remove all log entries?
There are currently no log entries available.
There are currently no cronjobs available.
Day of the month (1 - 31) in which the cron job should be executed.
Weekday (0 - 6 with Sunday = 0 or mon - sun) in which the cron job should be executed.
Hours (0 - 23) in which the cron job should be executed.
Minutes (0 - 59) in which the cron job should be executed.
Month (1 - 12 or jan - dec) in which the cron job should be executed.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: The user group has been successfully added.
{if $deletedGroups == 1}This user group has{else}{#$deletedGroups} These user groups have{/if} been successfully deleted.
Are you sure you would like to remove this user group?
Your user group changes have been successfully saved.
You are currently a member of this user group. Changing the permissions of this user group could result in locking yourself out of the Administration Control Panel. Please be careful!
Enter here a name for this group.
Activating this option will allow members of this user group to enter the Administration Control Panel and, dependent upon their permissions, run certain actions.
Members of this user group can view private user options.
Activating this option will allow members of this user group to view and change the system options - e.g. Forum on/offline.
Members of this user group can view the system logs.
Members of this user group can add new cronjobs.
Members of this user group can delete existing cronjobs.
Can delete log files of running cronjobs
Members of this user group can delete log files of running cronjobs. The log files are also checked by the associated cronjob if the log file was successfully written.
Members of this user group can edit existing cronjobs.
Members of this user group can disable existing cronjobs. Disabling a cronjob only stops the actual cronjob from running, but does not remove it.
Members of this user group can edit existing update servers and add new update servers.
Members of this user group can install additional packages.
Members of this user group can remove existing packages.
Members of this user group can update existing packages.
Members of this user group have access to the following groups. For example, here you can set if the user group has permission to edit themselves.
Members of this user group can add new user groups.
Members of this user group can add new users. If the option for "Accessible User groups" has been enabled, then on creation of the user, the appropriate accessible user groups can also be assigned.
Members of this user group can remove existing user groups.
Members of this user group can delete existing users.
Members of this user group can edit existing user groups.
Members of this user group can edit user e-mail addresses.
Members of this user group can edit user passwords.
Members of this user group can edit existing users.
Members of this user group can view other members' e-mail addresses and consequently send them e-mails.
Members of this user group can search existing users and their profiles.
The information you have entered is not valid.
Members of this user group can choose to view disabled styles.
Show the members of this user group

category.name: wcf.acp.masterPassword
category.item: This page or action requires you to enter the master password due to security reasons. You only need to do so once within a session. If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The master password is not correct.If you have forgotten the master password you can reset it by deleting the file {@RELATIVE_WCF_DIR}acp/masterPassword.inc.php.
The entered passwords are not identical.

The password is not secure. It has to contain at least eight characters, small and capital latin letters as well as numbers and special characters. It must not be identically with passwords of administrators of this page.

The master password is an additional protection for functions that are relevant to security. You should use a very secure password that must not be identically with your normal administrator password, unknown to others and not used on other websites.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter one hostname each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter one IP address each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter one user agent each row you want to exclude from this site.
Enter the address of the memcache server. You can enter one server each row.
By enabling this option a persistent connection to the memcache server will be used.
Please select the type of cache you want to use. Some of the types have special requirements to the server system and cannot be used in your environment.

Memcache stores data in the memory that is often accessed. This may reduce the database load dramatically. Read more about the memcache on the following site:
  • memcached.org
You can configure optional proxy servers for connections to external servers.

Internet pages are often attacked by programs and robots. E.g. it is possible to create hundreds of user accounts automatically. You can protect yourself against these spam bots with so called Captcha images on every place where web forms can be submitted. Unregistered users then first have to identify the code on the Captcha before they can submit the form. Robots cannot read the code. Please not that Captcha images cannot be read by blind and visually impaired people.
Enter here the domain in which the cookie should be used. This is optional, so in most cases you don't need to specify the cookie domain.
The cookie path is concurrent to the document root of your site - e.g. "/forum" for http://www.woltlab.com/forum.
Enter a prefix to be used for the cookie name here.
Should the clock automatically change according to the summer/winter time?
Use cache method for session data
Should the selected cache method be used to save the session data?
The information you have entered is not valid.
Download the exported options as a backup file to your local machine.
Enable this option to send content from the server to clients in a compressed form. This option reduces traffic.
Disable caching of pages in browsers
Enabling this option will prevent browsers from caching the pages.
A value of 1 to 9 is required. For optimum output for compression and server performance, we recommend a value of 1.
The import of the chosen file has failed.
The options have been imported successfully.
Upload the options to be imported from your local machine.
Enter the administrator's e-mail address here.
Path to the debug log file
Enter the path to the log file here
Enter the sender's e-mail address that should be used for automated e-mails here.
Enter the sender's name that should be used for automated e-mails here.
Enter a signature that should be sent with system e-mails here.
Enter the SMTP server name here.
Enter the SMTP server port here.
Enter the SMTP user name here.
Some servers may require the "-f" parameter to be used when sending e-mails. If your users experience problems with receiving e-mails, try enabling this option.
Sender's and receiver's addresses are formatted in "Name <email@domain.tld>". This option is not supported by all mail servers and should be turned off in case of any problems.
Pages and forms within the admin panel that are relevant to security can be protected with an additional master password.
Enter how long a session should remain valid for here [seconds].
The number or block of an IP address that should be checked while reading the session data. A high number can exclude users that use changing IP addresses.
Should the user agent be checked while reading the session data?
Your option changes have been successfully saved.
Choose your default time zone for your site.
Enter here how long users should remain marked as online after they are inactive [seconds].
Enter a short description of the page.
Enter the global title of the page here. That title will show up inside the board header, if you have enabled it with the style editor.
Please enter the URL of the page (without trailing slash).
Enter further URLs which are also directed at your site.

category.name: wcf.acp.package
category.item: Are you sure you would like to cancel this installation?
Package dependencies could not be satisfied for this Package.

The {if $action == 'install'}package installation{else}package update{/if} of package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion} cannot be executed due to incompatibilities with the following {if $excludedPackages|count == 1}package{else}packages{/if}:

{if $excludingPackages|count == 1}Following package doesn't{else}Following packages don't{/if} allow the {if $action == 'install'}package installation{else}package update{/if} of package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion} due to incompatibilities:

{if $excludingPackages|count == 1}Following package is{else}Following packages are{/if} incompatible with package "{$packageName}" in version {$packageVersion}. If you proceed installation the {if $excludingPackages|count == 1}package{else}packages{/if} probably won't work anymore.
{$package.name} ({if $package.open == 0}Installed{else}{if $package.file|isset}is located within this Package{else}Not available{/if}{/if})
Are you sure you would like to cancel the installation of this package?
The following packages can be updated with this package
Select one of the following packages, in order to update its version. If you would like to install the package again, please click on "{lang}wcf.global.button.next{/lang}".

A copy of this package is already installed. If you continue, a further copy of this package will be installed. If you would like to update an available copy of this package, please select the copy from the following list.
While unpacking the files of this package the following error occured:
The following files could not be unpacked successfully. Please check if the destination folder is writable.
Do not overwrite these tables and do not ask me again for this installation.
Overwrite the existing tables and do not ask me again for this installation.
Existing database tables conflict with the tables required to be installed by this package. Please choose whether to overwrite these tables.
The selected package brings the following options. Please select those you would like to install.
(The requirements of this Package have not been fulfilled.)
Another application is already installed in this folder.
This folder is already in use by the WoltLab Community Framework. Please choose a different location.
Please enter the installation folder name here.
This application is accessible through the following URL after installation in this folder:
The current package requires another package that is already installed several times. Please choose the instance that is required.
The chosen package has no valid installation routine.
The archive you have given is not a valid package.
The package "{$package->getName()}" could not be updated with the supplied archive.
No files were found within the specified directory.
The chosen package is already installed. Packages can not be installed more than one time.
The upload of the chosen archive has failed.
Enter the path of the package located on your server
Enter a direct path to the package-file here. An internet address can be used or alternatively the path to the package file using the server's file system.
Upload package from your local computer
Enter the package file to be uploaded from your computer here.

Installing template patches for the Administration Control Panel ...
Installing templates for the Administration Control Panel ...

Removing template patches of the Administration Control Panel ...
Removing templates from the Administration Control Panel ...

Updating template patches in the Administration Control Panel ...
Updating templates in the Administration Control Panel ...
Parent package allocation is being done ...

The patch that this package is trying to apply has failed because this patch is not compliant to its target file. Therefore this package cannot be installed. Please click the "{lang}wcf.acp.package.install.cancel{/lang}" button.

Re-patching of the following templates has failed:
{foreach from=$failures item=$failure}{$failure.templateName} (Originally patched by: {$failure.packageName})
{/foreach}The original patch package that was previously applied may no longer function. You should still continue with this update by clicking on the "{lang}wcf.global.button.next{/lang}" button.

The patch that this package is trying to remove has failed because its target file has been externally amended. Therefore this package cannot be removed. Please click the "{lang}wcf.acp.package.uninstall.cancel{/lang}" button.
It is not possible to uninstall these packages, because there is at least one dependent package, that cannot be uninstalled.
Upon final confirmation {if $dependentPackages|count == 1}this package{else}these packages{/if} will be removed without any further promting.
Go to the Administration Control Panel
Are you sure that you would like to remove this package?

Find users that are not members of the chosen user groups.
this.count == 1 ? "1 user selected" : this.count+" users selected"
The chosen action has been executed successfully on {#$affectedUsers} users.

The bulk processor will perform the following tasks without additional security notification, on all users matching the set conditions. Bulk processing can be very performance intensive, so it should only be executed when the forum is offline. To have a correct display of your content you should update the counters. The processing can not be reversed, so please be attentive when using this function.

Here you can enter the sender's e-mail address in the following format:

{if MAIL_USE_FORMATTED_ADDRESS}Senders name <email@sender.tld>{else}email@sender.tld{/if}

If you have completely filled in the section under System -> Options -> E-mail, then this field will automatically be filled in. If you are sending e-mails using SMTP, then the sender's e-mail-Address must also be accepted by the server.
Send an e-mail to the members of the following user groups:
Send an e-mail to the following users
Enter here the message you want to send to users.
